genes.title: ä½¿ç”¨æ–¹æ³•
genes.content:
version: 2
agents:
  lead_reviewer:
    model: claude-3-5-sonnet-20241022
    role: "Lead code reviewer ensuring quality and best practices"
    tools: [Read, Write]
    delegates_to: [security_expert, performance_analyst]
    hooks:
      on_user_message:
        - run: "git diff main..HEAD > /tmp/changes.diff"
          append_output_to_context: true

  security_expert:
    model: claude-3-5-sonnet-20241022
    role: "Security specialist checking for vulnerabilities"
    tools: [Read]
    hooks:
      on_user_message:
        - run: "semgrep --config=auto --json"
          append_output_to_c

genes.title: æ ¸å¿ƒç‰¹æ€§
genes.content:
- **ğŸš€ Decoupled from Claude Code**: No more dependency on Claude Code
- **âš¡ Single Process Architecture**: All agents run in one Ruby process using [RubyLLM](https://github.com/parruda/ruby_llm) - no more managing multiple processes
- **ğŸ¯ More Efficient**: Direct method calls instead of MCP inter-process communication
- **ğŸ”§ Richer Features**: Node workflows, hooks system, scratchpad/memory tools, and more
- **ğŸ® Better Control**: Fine-grained permissions, cost tracking, structured logging
- **ğŸ’» Interactive REPL**: Built with TTY toolkit for a nice command-line experience
- **ğŸŒ Multiple LL

class MyPlugin < SwarmSDK::Plugin
  def on_agent_init(agent)
    # Add custom behavior when agent initializes
  end

  def on_user_message(message, agent)
    # Process user messages
  end

  def provide_tools
    [MyCustomTool.new]
  end
end
